newsitem.title: USA: US stock index futures drop late, end sharply off.
newsitem.headline: US stock index futures drop late, end sharply off.

text.p: Dec 12 - U.S. stock index futures ended with very steep losses and near the lows. Traders said heavy selling by one large broker, with some estimating the sales at 12,000 S&P contracts, pushed prices down late. Premiums narrowed, which in turn set off arbitrage sell programs that fueled declines in cash stocks late. March S&Ps ended below several support levels, they said. ((DerivativesDesk 312-408-8750/E-mail:derivatives@reuters.com))
